info.name: Tuber cinereum
info.description: The tuber cinereum is a region of the hypothalamic gray matter that includes the median eminence and the base of the infundibular stalk. It is bounded by the optic chiasm, optic tracts and the anterior edge of the mammillary bodies. Important in the hypothalamic regulation of the adenohypophysis.
info.item: /Gross/Brain stem & Cerebellum/Brain stem/2 Cranial nerves-I to X + XII
